logLevel.description:
consola 日志级别 (浏览器控制台)

use 'LogLevels.debug' for debug

format.description:
游戏解析格式

- fountain(markdown): 以 Markdown 文本编辑为核心体验的解析方式
- flow(json): 以节点编辑器为开发工作流的节点解析方式

theme.description: Theme to use for the advjs

canvasWidth.description:
The actual width for canvas.
unit in px.

selectable.description: Controls whether texts in slides are selectable

description.default: '面向未来与前端的 ADV 文字冒险游戏引擎'

characters.description:
adv/characters/*.character.ts
all characters appear in the game

AssetsManifest.description: The expected format of a manifest. This could be auto generated or hand made

AssetsBundle.description: Structure of a bundle found in a {@link assets.AssetsManifest Manifest} file

UnresolvedAsset<any>.description: An asset that has not been resolved yet.

src.description: The URL or relative path to the asset

loadParser.description: An override that will ensure that the asset is loaded with a specific parser

ResolvedSrc.description: A fully resolved src, Glob patterns will not work here, and the src will be resolved to a single file.

src.description: The URL or relative path to the asset

loadParser.description: An override that will ensure that the asset is loaded with a specific parser

AdvBaseNode.description:
考虑到需要通过节点编辑器进行编辑

结构参考 React/Vue Flow 的节点结构

gpu.description: A global singleton providing top-level entry points like {@link GPU#requestAdapter}.
